description.action: Evan stands in the center of the courtyard, his arms raised in celebration as he leads the other children in recounting their adventures.
Isaac bounces and hops around, his koala-like movements reflecting his enthusiasm as he describes how his animal form helped them escape Bowser's traps.
Aaron stomps and roars, his dinosaur-like behavior bringing a sense of excitement to the retelling of their heroic deeds.
Aurelia giggles and claps her hands, her panda-like mannerisms adding a playful energy as she remembers the moments when their animal forms helped them outwit Bowser's minions.
